text: Through the Wormhole is an American science documentary television series. It is narrated and hosted by Morgan Freeman. It has different episodes explaining about the wormhole, the universe, and mysteries about life. It's musical score is composed by Hans Zimmer. It's first episode was broadcasted on June 9, 2010. Category:2010 establishments in the United States Category:American television series Category:Documentaries
title: Through the Wormhole
